scripts.pack: npm run build && webpack --mode="development" --devtool source-map dist/src/main.js -o dist/bundle.js && sorcery -i dist/bundle.js
scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.build: cd ./../MetaDataTransformer && npm run build && cd ./../MetaDataTransformerUsage && npm run restore && cd ./../MetaDataTransformer && npm run start -- -v build --pattern="/src/**/*.ts" --out-dir="./dist" --root-dir="./../MetaDataTransformerUsage" --module=CommonJS --module-resolution=NodeJs --target=ES5 --source-map --source-root=".\..\..\..\.." --map-root=".\.." && cd ./../MetaDataTransformerUsage
scripts.clean: (cd ./../MetaDataTransformer) && (npm run clean) && (cd ./../MetaDataTransformerUsage) && (if exist node_modules rmdir node_modules /q /s) && (if exist dist rmdir dist /q /s) && (if exist package-lock.json del -f -q package-lock.json) && (if exist test_out rmdir test_out /q /s)
scripts.test: cd ./../MetaDataTransformer && npm run build && cd ./../MetaDataTransformerUsage && npm run restore && cd ./../MetaDataTransformer && npm run start -- -v build --pattern="/test/**/*.ts" --root-dir="./../MetaDataTransformerUsage" --out-dir="./test_out" && cd ./../MetaDataTransformerUsage && jest .test.js --coverage --coverageReporters=text
scripts.test-coveralls: cd ./../MetaDataTransformer && npm run build && cd ./../MetaDataTransformerUsage && npm run restore && cd ./../MetaDataTransformer && npm run start -- -v build --pattern="/test/**/*.ts" --root-dir="./../MetaDataTransformerUsage" --out-dir="./test_out" --source-map --inline-source-map && cd ./../MetaDataTransformerUsage && jest .test.js --coverage --coverageReporters=text-lcov | coveralls
